slider.desc: Chikkodi-Sadalga Chikodi-Sadalga, is an Assembly/Vidhan Sabha seat in Mumbai Karnataka region and Belgaum district of Karnataka.
Chikkodi Lok Sabha/Parliamentary constituency. This seat is categoried as: Rural.
